effects.text: A soft breeze carries the scent of fresh citrus around you.
Tiny motes of light dance in the air near your hands for a moment.
Your voice gains a pleasant echo that makes stories sound grander.
A faint melody hums around you, brightening the mood.
A single, harmless bubble of colored light floats above your palm and pops.
Your handwriting curls into decorative flourishes for a short while.
A tiny fortune cookie appears in your hand. Its message says — The road to success is always under construction.
A warm, pleasant scent of cinnamon wafts from your clothing.
The next correct or incorrect thing you say will either have a loud buzz or ding to accompany it.
A tiny paper bird flutters from your sleeve and hovers for a moment.
A small animal such as a squirrel, cat, or bird stops at your feet for a moment, and presents you with a normal pebble.
You must finish each sentence with a rhyme for the next minute or so.
You hear a sneeze nearby.
You find a single gold piece on the ground in front of you. It wasn't there a second ago.
The weather changes.
Everyone nearby suddenly feels hungry.
A nearby object suddenly falls to the ground.
You can read, speak, and understand any language for the next 5 minutes.
A soft bell sound rings the next time you smile; it's warm and friendly.
Your shoes suddenly feel like they are on the wrong feet. They are.
A little note appears on your hand with a friendly doodle.
A faint aroma of baked bread surrounds you for a moment.
Your eyes change colour for the rest of the day.
A nearby chair looks incredibly inviting to sit in.
Your shadow appears twice as large as you would expect. And three times as friendly.
A single leaf twirls gently in the wind across your path.
Your tooth feels wiggly. You pull on it, to reveal a tiny pearl worth 2 gold pieces. A new tooth grows in it's place during your next long rest.
You find a trail of breadcrumbs leading no where.
A nearby light flicks off for a few seconds.
Your hair and clothing start to float as if unfelt by gravity for a few seconds.
Your pocket feels slightly warmer for a short while; comforting.
You hear a faint applause in the distance in response to your latest action.
You suddenly find yourself holding a whistle. When you blow it, nothing happens and it disappears.
Your clothes are magically pressed and cleaned.
The moon changes phase.
You have no reflection until you take a long rest.
You find a teacup in your hands. Once the liquid is gone, the cup vanishes in a puff of smoke.
You find a mug of ale in your hands. Once the liquid is gone, the mug vanishes in a puff of smoke.
You find a glass of wine in your hands. Once the liquid is gone, the glass vanishes in a puff of smoke.
You smell the nearest nearby food, regardless of distance.
Everyone forgets they've met you before for the next minute or so.
Everyone regards you as an old friend for the next minute or so.
You grow a beautiful moustache for the next hour. You have advantage on desception checks when trying to conceal your identity.
A single harmless feather drifts by and settles on your sleeve.
You suddenly know exactly what time of day it is.
Your boots fill with beach sand.
Your boots fill with water.
Every step you take for the next 5 minutes leaves a muddy footprint.
A nearby plant seems to be talking to you, but you don't exactly understand what it's trying to say.
You remember a rumor about a hidden treasure nearby — but the rumor is clearly false.
Your voice briefly carries a persuasive undertone that draws attention.
A comforting aura makes nearby allies feel a little more at ease.
A small mark of good luck appears on your palm and stays for a short while.
A brief, vivid memory of home fills you with calm and clarity.
You find a trail of ants marching towards a hole in a nearby object..
You find an acorn in your pocket. It could grow into something one day.
The world seems to have shrunk in size. Or you've grown slightly. It's impossible to tell. This only lasts a minute.
You notice a bee nest in a nearby corner that definitely wasn't there a minute ago.
You find a warm and fresh cup of milk. Someone was saving this for a rainy day!
You hear the sound of a door or lock opening, but have no idea where it came from.
A painting, woodland creature, or object tries to point something out to you subtly.
Everyone's laces, straps, or buckles become a bit looser nearby.
You find a key on the ground. It looks important.
You find a note on the ground describing someone who is missing a lost goldfish. Reward offered.
You find a missing goldfish. This is probably worth something to someone!
You feel compelled to walk backwards for a few minutes.
A nearby door closes while a window opens. You write that down.
You find a piece of a treasure map in your pocket.
You hear the sound of maniacal laughter. Probably best to avoid that.
You feel lighter, as if you could jump higher than usual.
A small bunny hops past, seemingly in a hurry.
You hear the sound of whispering gnomes nearby, speaking about a goliath, dwarves, minotaurs, and a deranged gnome.
You find a sword, deeply embedded in a large rock.
You find a painting of a mysterious traveler with a wide-brimmed hat, singing a song about tossing a coin at a witch.
You find a painting of a couple of halflings, an elf, a dwarf, and two humans travelling together.
You find a pickaxe made of blue diamonds embedded in a rock. Upon closer inspection, it's cheap and a huge waste of time.
Every step you take makes a loud squeaking noise for the next 2 minutes.
A foul odor fills the air. The next humanoid to speak takes 1 damage.
Make a DC15 charisma saving throw. If you fail, every time you try to speak, butterflies crawl out of your mouth for the next minute.
Your hair and clothing billow heroically in non-existent wind for 10 seconds.
Everyone within a 25ft radius is affected by the friends spell for up to 1 minute.
A nearby lock clicks faintly if it is trapped or tampered with; you learn whether one chosen nonmagical lock within 30 feet is trapped.
Crows circle overhead or appear magically around you. Cawing fills the air. They leave after a minute or until someone screams.
A single red balloon floats into view, and slowly drifts past, sending a chill down everyones spine.
The sound of children laughing echoes in the distance. There are no children nearby.
Every light source seems to dim and flicker for a moment., except for the one closest to you — which casts long shadows across the area.
You feel the presence of an additional person in the area. Was there this many people here before? Or has someone snuck in unnoticed.
Every step you take, leaves a path of blooming flowers.
Any non-magical broken objects or worn down equipment you have is magically repaired.
You see two rainbows off in the distsance. Wait...It's starting to look like a triple rainbow!
You feel two gold coins appear in your pocket. These seem special or useful for some reason.
You find yourself holding a map in your hand. It's mostly a map of the area you are in, except there is a big X marked on it.
As you speak, thunder rumbles above and lightning flashes. You feel very important all of a sudden.
You find a small golden beetle crawling across the floor. It seems to be an omen of good luck!
Something feels strange in your boots. As you pull off your boot, a strange trinket falls out. It seems incredibly important to someone else nearby.
You hear a whisper nearby. It seems to be from someone who recently passed away, sharing a secret.
Time stops for everyone except you for 30 seconds. When it ends, you are teleported back to where you started.
Everyone nearby randomly teleports somewhere within 100 ft.
You can ask a single question to anyone and it must be answered truthfully.
A wild unicorn approaches out of no where, and offers it's loyalty for the rest of the day.
A harmless spark flickers from your weapon, creating a loud but harmless pop.
You feel a quick jolt of alertness that steadies your aim for a moment (flavor).
Your boots make a crisp sound that sharpens your footing briefly.
A tiny burst of harmless light marks your target for a second; decorative.
A polite gust cools your brow and keeps you focused during the fray (flavor).
A faint ringing makes your next quick shout sound more commanding.
Your grip feels marginally firmer for an instant; purely cosmetic but reassuring.
Small motes swirl around your weapon and then dissipate.
A harmless shimmer outlines your shield briefly, making it look sturdier.
A quick, imaginary cheer echoes, raising your spirits slightly (flavor).
A tiny flash marks your boots with a symbol for a moment; decorative.
You feel a brief pulse of adrenaline; roleplay boost only.
A soft clang sounds when your weapon swings, oddly melodic but harmless.
Your posture straightens and you feel slightly more confident in combat.
A tiny ember flares on your gauntlet then dies out; decorative.
A small breeze helps you steady a thrown weapon; flavor only.
A harmless flicker of light traces your weapon's arc for a second.
Your shout carries with extra gusto; purely theatrical.
A quick pulse in your limbs makes your next minor movement feel brisker.
A harmless sparkles trail from your steps, marking your path for a moment.
A brief, harmless shimmer outlines a nearby rock, making it easier to see (flavor).
A small, encouraging tap seems to land on your shoulder as if from nowhere.
A tiny spark flickers at the edge of your vision; it fades without effect.
You feel a crispness in the air that heightens your senses slightly.
A small note of triumph seems to play when you make an aggressive gesture.
A harmless ripple of light traces the edge of your blade for a beat.
Your breathing syncs in a satisfying way, aiding focus (flavor).
A small emblem briefly shines on your armor, then dulls.
A faint drumbeat seems to follow you, keeping a steady rhythm.
A whisper of wind cools a heated blade, purely cosmetic.
A tiny flash of harmless light darts along your shield's rim.
Your next quick motion feels slightly more precise; flavor only.
A small, friendly caw from an unseen bird punctuates the clash of steel.
A brief gleam traces a useful seam in armor, making it look tidy.
A harmless spark dances along your gauntlet and then disappears.
A small echo of encouragement reaches you just when you need it; roleplay boost.
A short, bright sound rings when you strike, pleasing to the ear.
A tiny shimmer shows the edge of your sword for a split second.
A quick, harmless gust steadies you as you plant your feet.
A faint glow marks a small notch on a weapon, decorative only.
A little drumroll plays in the air briefly when you take decisive action.
A tiny flare decorates your helm then fades; harmless.
A small, warm glow makes your gauntlets feel comfortable for a moment.
A brief tingle in your fingers heightens your sense of touch; flavor.
A subtle shimmer makes a small emblem on your shield stand out.
A polite clang sounds when your weapon taps armor; oddly musical.
A small, harmless spark flares at the tip of your weapon and dies.
A soft tone hangs in the air as you make a bold move; decorative.
A brief warmth spreads through your arms, steadying your grip.
A tiny flash of harmless color blooms where your weapon lands, then fades.
You feel a surge that grants you a small boost of vigor (roleplay; DM may grant minor benefit).
A focused spark empowers your next strike with extra flair (flavorful small bonus).
A steadying pulse steadies your aim, making a precise action feel easier.
A bright mote of light marks your weapon, making it more visible and confident.
A small shield of warming light surrounds you briefly, easing aches (flavor).
A burst of kinetic pep gives your legs a quick spring; small repositioning help (DM decides).
A short, resonant chord grants a momentary edge to your next maneuver (flavor).
A focused breath clears your head, letting you react smoothly to danger.
A sharp, bright flash distracts foes briefly (DM adjudicates small effect).
A helper spark shows a better footing for an instant, aiding balance.
A healing warmth soothes a minor bruise, restoring a little vigor (flavor only).
A brief gust improves a thrown weapon's path slightly (DM optional small bonus).
A shimmer of resolve steadies your hand, improving a precise action's feel.
A helpful spot of light picks out a safe footfall for a moment (flavorful aid).
A small, focused ember enhances the bite of your next nonmagical attack (flavor).
A brief pulse of energy tightens your muscles, giving a brief edge in speed.
A short, resonant tone inspires an ally nearby with a burst of confidence (roleplay).
A faint shield of light reduces sharp discomfort for a moment; flavor benefit.
A bright sparkle draws a foe's eye for an instant, giving room for a tactic (DM discretion).
A small, steadying warmth returns some composure, aiding subsequent actions.
A bright flash distracts one creature you can see; it has disadvantage on the next attack roll or ability check it makes before the end of its next turn.
A ringing note steadies your focus; you have advantage on the next attack roll or ability check you make before the end of your next turn.
A gentle gust nudges you; you can immediately move up to 5 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

A tiny thunderpop startles nearby creatures; one creature of your choice within 10 feet must succeed on a DC 10 Wisdom save or is distracted, granting you or an ally advantage on the next check against it before the end of your next turn.
Your next damage roll from a weapon attack or spell before the end of your next turn deals an extra 1d4 damage of a type of your choice.
You can take one additional bonus action this turn, but only to Dash, Disengage, or Use an Object (simple interaction).
A spectral buckler hovers at your side for 1 minute; you gain +1 AC. The buckler vanishes if you are incapacitated.
You can cast one cantrip you know as a bonus action this turn.
As a bonus action, you can teleport up to 10 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.
You and one ally you can see each regain 1d6 hit points.
You cast *Fireball* (3rd-level) centered on a point you can see within 150 feet; it requires no components or spell slot.
You cast *Lightning Bolt* (3rd-level) in a 100-foot line you choose; it requires no components or spell slot.
You gain one extra action this turn. This action can be used to take the Attack (one weapon attack), Dash, Disengage, Hide, Use an Object, or cast a cantrip.
Allies you choose within 30 feet immediately regain hit points equal to their hit point maximum (they are healed to full).
You immediately regain all expended spell slots of 3rd level and lower.
